mooc-i18n-welcome: Used to greet the user when reading the i18n/??.json file.
mooc-helloworld:
Page title of the HelloWorld special page.
{{Identical|Hello World}}
mooc-helloworld-intro: Text displayed on the HelloWorld SpecialPage.
helloworld:
Text of the link to the HelloWorld special page on SpecialPages.
{{Identical|Hello World}}
mwe-mooc-section-learning-goals: Name of the learning goals section when used within a sentence.
mwe-mooc-section-video: Name of the video section when used within a sentence.
mwe-mooc-section-script: Name of the script section when used within a sentence.
mwe-mooc-section-quiz: Name of the quiz section when used within a sentence.
mwe-mooc-section-further-reading: Name of the further reading section when used within a sentence.
mwe-mooc-section-lessons: Name of the lessons section when used within a sentence.
mwe-mooc-section-units: Name of the units section when used within a sentence.
mwe-mooc-button-save-edit: Label of the button that saves the edits made to a section.
mwe-mooc-button-cancel: Label of the button that cancels the current action.
mwe-mooc-button-expand-section: Label of the button that expands the section.
